Translations.Text: Ma ur ebisen ara ixabiten, imehzulen n wul, akked wid ipxeooiven di Lmadina, ad ak Nebges $uosen. Sinna, siwa cwii n tallit ara yilin, degs, d loiran ik
Ad pwaxzun anda ten nufan, ad pwaiifen, ad pwan$en akw
D tannumi n Oebbi ar wid iaaddan zik. Ur teppafev, d awez$i, abeddel, di tannumi n Oebbi
Steqsan k imdanen, af yimir. Ini: "it Issnen siwa Oebbi". Anwa ad ak imlen, amar imir iqeob ed
Oebbi, s tidep, Ixza ijehliyen, Ihegga yasen d u$ud
Ad wekkoen degs, i lebda; ur ppafen bab, ne$ asettao
Ass ideg ara zzin wudmawen nnsen, ar tmes, ad inin: "a yamxix nne$! A lemmer nunez i Oebbi, u nunez i Umazan
Ad inin: "a Mass nne$! Nekwni nunez i igeldan nne$, i imeqwoanen nne$, telfen a$ ar yir abrid
A Mass nne$! Aaqeb iten berdayen, u Xzu ten s leqsee
A wid iumnen! Ur ppilit am wid i ijjerin Musa. Izekka t Oebbi, seg wayen id nnan. Illa ar Oebbi d amxallef
A wid iumnen! Eezzbet i Oebbi, tinim awal umain
Ad awen Iueggem igiten nnwen, ad Isemmee ibekkaven nnwen. Win iouvan Oebbi akked Umazan iS, ni$ ibbwi arraz ameqwoaean
Naaoev a nefk lamana i igenwan, i tmurt, i idurar. Ugin a p iifen. Ugaden p. Ibubb ip umdan. Neppa ard amednus ur nessin
Ihi, ad Isaaddi Oebbi aaaqeb af ixabiten akked txabitin, wid akked tid ipcaraken. Ad Issuref Oebbi i wid akked tid iumnen. Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ccekoan i Oebbi, i iIan i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. I Neppa, ccekoan di laxert. Neppa, d Bab n uuwab, Ippuxebbeo
Ieoa ayen ikeccmen di tmurt, ayen id iteff$en segs, ayen id iprusun seg igenni, ayen ippalin $uoes. Neppa Ipeunu, Ipsemmie

Nnan wid ijehlen: "ur a$ d ippas yimir". Ini: "xaii, s Mass iw, ara kwen id ias"! Amusnaw n tbavnit, ur idrig fellaS ubruy ubelkim, ama deg igenwan, ama di ddunit; ama seddaw wannect is, ama sennig es; akw, di Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ad Ikafi wid iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan. I wigi, ssmae akked ooeeq ukyis
Wid ikkaten deg issekniyen nne£, sfunnugen, widak, fellasen aaaqeb n twa$it taqeoeant
Wid iwumi teppunefk tmusni, walan ar ayen id irsen $uoek, s$uo Mass ik, d tidep. Ippawi s abrid n Uzmir, Amaazuz
Nnan wid ijehlen: "day ad awen nessken argaz, ar awen d yinin ar ma teftutsem, yal aftutes, i kunwi lxelq amaynut
Iger ed tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ne$ d aoehbani"? Xaii, wid ur numin ara s laxeot, haaten deg uaaqeb, akked ttelfan u$miq

Day ur walan ara ayen illan zdat sen, u deffir sen, di tmurt akked igenwan? Ma ihwa ya£, a ten Nger seddaw tmurt, ne$ a d Nesse$li fellasen igezzim seg igenni. Deg wayagi, ih, d assekni i yal amdan ucaif
